questions.title: Who can modify the value in coins, effort, and priority of a task?
questions.response: Only project leaders and organization leaders can modify these fields.

questions.title: Can I delete a task within a project?
questions.response: Only project leaders and organization leaders have permission to delete tasks.

questions.title: How is the value in coins of a task calculated?
questions.response: The system automatically calculates the coin value based on the effort and priority assigned to the task during creation.
